software.make: Used to build the spmm_csr_example program
software.gunzip: Used to decompress the input matrix files
software.srun: Used to launch the spmm_csr_example program on the cluster nodes
software.ncu: Used to profile the spmm_csr_example program with CUDA-GDB

files.spmm_csr_example: The program used to perform sparse matrix-matrix multiplication
files.load_balancing_kernel: A CUDA kernel used for load balancing
files.reports/report_spmm_32_rabbit_$base_file: The output file containing the profiling results
